io.codeleaf.config

Interface ConfigurationProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationCache, ConfigurationServiceLoader

    public interface ConfigurationProvider
    This class is used to obtain configurations.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    tvburger@gmail.com

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConfigurationProvider.Holder
      Holder for a singleton, to obtain the singleton, use get()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConfigurationProvider get()
      Returns a ConfigurationProvider to load configurations
      <T extends Configuration>
      T      		 getConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Returns the configuration of the specified type.
      <T extends Configuration>
      boolean      		 hasConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
      Returns true if a configuration of the specified type is present.
      <T extends Configuration>
      T      		 parseConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass, Specification specification)
      Parses the specification into a configuration of the specified type.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        static ConfigurationProvider get()
        Returns a ConfigurationProvider to load configurations
        Returns:
        a ConfigurationProvider
        Throws:
        ExceptionInInitializerError - if the Holder is lazy initialized and during initialization an exception was thrown

      • hasConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> boolean hasConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
        Returns true if a configuration of the specified type is present.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration to check for
        Returns:
        true if the configuration of the specified type is found, otherwise false

      • getConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> T getConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass)
                                      throws ConfigurationNotFoundException,
                                             SpecificationNotFoundException,
                                             IOException,
                                             SpecificationFormatException,
                                             InvalidSpecificationException
        Returns the configuration of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration to load
        Returns:
        the configuration of the specified type
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - if no ConfigurationFactory is registered for the specified type
        SpecificationNotFoundException - if the Specification could not be loaded
        IOException - if an exception occurred during opening or reading the Specification or initialization of the specific configuration
        SpecificationFormatException - if the Specification has an invalid format
        InvalidSpecificationException - if the Specification has invalid fields or field values
        NullPointerException - if configurationTypeClass is null
        See Also:
        ConfigurationFactory, Specification, SpecificationLoader

      • parseConfiguration

        <T extends Configuration> T parseConfiguration(Class<T> configurationTypeClass,
                                               Specification specification)
                                        throws ConfigurationNotFoundException,
                                               InvalidSpecificationException
        Parses the specification into a configuration of the specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the configuration
        Parameters:
        configurationTypeClass - the type class of the configuration to parse into
        specification - the specification to parse from
        Returns:
        the configuration that was parsed
        Throws:
        ConfigurationNotFoundException - when no ConfigurationFactory is registered for the specified type
        InvalidSpecificationException - when the Specification has invalid fields or field values
        NullPointerException - if configurationTypeClass or specification is null
        See Also:
        ConfigurationFactory, Specification, SpecificationLoader
